Items.Name: Beginning
Items.Info:
Hello player! 
You have to solve the problem by writing code to help the main character - <color=green>assistant robot</color> - solve problems on his way and continue his story.
 Now going to a little more.

Items.Title: Training Quest
Items.Information: During the execution of the task, you can see its description in the <color=green>left section of the area</color>. In addition, the detection of a <color=green>gray dot</color> in the area can be obtained again additional information that is held before the task.

Items.Info: Programming requires some kind of tool, so the multi-functionality of the <color=green>tablet</color> is available to you. To enable it, all you need to do is <color=green>click on it</color>.
Items.VideoTitles: Learn to play, turn on the panel

Items.Title: Learning. Writing Code
Items.Info: Most of the tablet screen is occupied by the code field, this is where the most important thing happens - <color=green>programming</color>.

Items.Title: Learning. Code Reset
Items.Info: If it suddenly seems to you that the solution to the problem went somewhere wrong, you can quickly return to the initial code using the <color=green>Reset code</color> button.

Items.Information: In case it is not clear how to take the stand, you can pick up a <color=green>hint</color>. Each hint becomes available after a few minutes, so it's best to solve the stand problem for yourself. Plus, it's just more fun!)

Items.Title: Training. Handbook
Items.Info: While solving a problem, you will discover a lot of new things about the programming language. In order not to forget anything, you can tell about a specific <color=green>reference</color>, where everything that you have learned earlier is collected.

Items.Title: Training. Tests
Items.Info: To keep things interesting, each challenge has been given <color=green>challenge</color>. Completing each one will give you <color=green>stars</color>. Try to get them all!
If you make a <color=green>error</color> in your code, the IDE will let you know, ask for a <color=green>message</color> at the bottom of the screen.

Items.Title: Learning. Minimizing the tablet
Items.Info: Button in the <color=green>top resolution area</color> of the tablet collapses it. >!
Items.VideoTitles: Learning to play, turn off the panel

Items.Name: First task
Items.Info: Well, now it's time to program!
